Articles.Content:
It worked for me before, but now I can't insert any embedded images. I'm using the (img)(/img) code (except replace the parenthesis with brackets) with the link of my image. What am I doing wrong?

For example...

http://i.imgur.com/hXytRsP.png?1

Edited December 22, 2015 by Der Anfang

In the bottom right of the editor there is a gray button that says Insert Other Media. Click it and select Insert Image from URL, then paste the image URL in. Nice ship, though!

Edited December 22, 2015 by legoclone09

I have different kind of problem. I have inserted imgur album in post. After that I changed my mind, inserted just one picture instead, with a link to album.

So far, so good, but I can't select previous imgur album to delete it from post. Anyone know how to do that on new forum ?
It's a bit tricky as you can't see the highlighting on imgur albums, but if you try to highlight it like you do with text you can then remove it with backspace and delete.

On 22.12.2015. at 10:15 PM, sal_vager said:

It's a bit tricky as you can't see the highlighting on imgur albums, but if you try to highlight it like you do with text you can then remove it with backspace and delete.

Thanks. I ended with writing few words before and after imgur album.

That way I was able to "force" selecting imgur album that is catched between two pieces of text.

17 minutes ago, DarthVader said:

How to insert Imgur albums?

you can use the icon (the white i with a green dot in a white square) - in the following dialog window, you just need to add the album's imgur ID (the random letters after the /)
